amendment.description: An amendment numbered 33 printed in House Report 119-232 to revise appropriations to reduce unobligated funds from top-line accounts totaling $37,353,345,385.09.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to revise appropriations to reduce unobligated funds from top-line accounts totaling $37,353,345,385.09.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schweikert amendment (A014) Failed by recorded vote: 76 - 351 (Roll no. 237).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Schweikert amendment (A014) Failed by recorded vote: 76 - 351 (Roll no. 237).
